entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
